episodes.title: S2 Episode 11 - Fear and Laughter
episodes.summary:
Ryan comes to a realization about the laughter and his father. New information on Northwoods Reclamation is derailed by a disheartening phone call.

***

episodes.title: S2 Episode 10 - Rabbit Trails
episodes.summary:
Ryan focuses on finding Northwoods Reclamation, Inc. While he works on tracking down a lead, a chance meeting with Julie takes a turn.

***

Help support the podcast and save $50 off ANY mattress purchase at casper.com/sth by using promo code STH at checkout.

episodes.title: S2 Episode 09 - Road Trip
episodes.summary:
Ryan learns of a Minnesota connection to the laughter and takes a road trip to the Lake Superior shores. There he must face the pain the laughter has created in someone else as he gets another piece of the puzzle.

***

episodes.title: S2 Episode 08 - Straws
episodes.summary:
Ryan speaks with a reporter, who has startling news about the laughter. Meanwhile, living without answers takes it's toll, until new motivation presents itself.

 

More information about the Dark Tome podcast can be seen HERE.

episodes.title: S2 Episode 07 - Out of the Darkness
episodes.summary: The sins of the past remain as Ryan struggles to recover and continue  his search for answers...among other things. But he soon finds that the  more things change, the more they stay the same. Not all obstacles come  from the darkness.

episodes.title: S2 Episode 06 - Running
episodes.summary:
Ryan and Sara come face-to-face with the darkness.

***

"Here I Am" written and performed by Marcela Carmona. More of her music can be found at marcelacarmona.bandcamp.com

Composer: Tom Parsons

episodes.title: S2 Episode 05 - Surviving
episodes.summary:
Ryan makes an impossible choice and lives hang in the balance.

episodes.summary:
Ryan and Sara find themselves trapped with only one way to go. They soon find that the fear they have known was only the beginning.

episodes.title: S2 Episode 03 - Learning
episodes.summary:
Ryan and Sara find Ashbury. Ryan's search drives him to learn a painful truth: that the horror has just begun.

episodes.title: S2 Episode 02 - Finding
episodes.summary:
The discussion goes to darker places as Ryan and Sara go deeper into the woods and further away from the lives they once knew. Into the ash.

episodes.title: S2 Episode 01 - Searching
episodes.summary:
Ryan and Sara search for Ashbury and answers. But at what cost?

episodes.title: S1: A Warning From Ashbury
episodes.summary: A voice message left by Ryan...from Ashbury. A plea from the darkness.

episodes.title: S1 Episode 07 - When the Laughter Stops
episodes.summary: Ryan finally finds the laughter.

episodes.title: S1 Episode 06 - For Laughs
episodes.summary: The voices in the laughter are closer than ever and they point Ryan in a direction he never imagined.

episodes.title: S1 Episode 05 - Alone, Not Alone
episodes.summary: Ryan and Roger go looking for sounds. Then Ryan goes for a walk...

episodes.title: S1 Episode 04 - Isolation
episodes.summary: It's been two weeks...time is a dangerous thing, especially when isolation is concerned. Time does nothing to silence the laughter.

episodes.title: S1 Episode 03 - Broken Silence
episodes.summary: Ryan tracks down Steven Alderman's mother, but doesn't like what he hears. Another person from his past tries to help him shed light on the laughter.

episodes.title: Announcement
episodes.summary: Episode 3 (and all future episodes) will now be available for early release to anyone donating $1 or more per month to the podcast through Patreon.com/smalltownhorror

episodes.title: S1 Episode 02 - Voices From The Past
episodes.summary: Ryan listens to the recording of his interview following his release from captivity 18 years ago and finds out the nature of the sound he recorded in his father's house.

episodes.title: S1 Episode 01 - Homecoming
episodes.summary: After 18 years, Ryan Jennings finally returns home to Crayton,Minnesota. There he finds an old friend and an older nightmare.

episodes.title: S1 Episode 0: Tape 2 - The Why
episodes.summary:
In 1998 Ryan Jennings recorded himself performing a localhorrorlegend known to Crayton, Minnesota, as "The Sinner's Game".And hislife changed forever.

Tape 2 of 2

episodes.title: S1 Episode 0: Tape 1 - The Where
episodes.summary:
In 1998 Ryan Jennings recorded a VHS tape in an attempt tounderstand the mysteries that only seem to exist within hishometown of Crayton, Minnesota.

 

Tape 1 of 2.
